content.detailedDescription: Was absorving what looked like 2 bright stars but they were wobbelling and fading away into the sky what looked like something leave our atmosphere. once they faded withink 10 secs another ifo was spotted. this was a shorter sighting 2-3seconds, what looked like a shooting star went across the sky in our atmosphere where the 2 orbs were observed very fast.
content.summary: 2 bright dots moving what looks like out of our atmosphere and disappearing & moments later what looks like a shooting star went across the same sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was pulling out of grayhawk golf club at 8:30. as i was waiting to pull onto thompson peak i noticed 4 hugh lights off to the se fairly low in the sky...Barely over treetops. being familiar with the area i knew there were no lights that large and grouped together that i had ever seen. what caught my attention was the fact they (lights)were so bright and very large, and they seemed to stay in exactly the same place as a unit, but did tilt a few times where it then looked like a rectangle with lights in four corners. then one of the lights would break off and. become smaller. then it would move away steadily and travel sw.  the main ship seemed to stay in a hovering  position for sure, just moving. 
i turned east on thompson peak and tried to see it over the trees. so i knew i had to get in a clearer point of view. i headed south on pima rd and followed the hovering ship four 4 miles. darkness had totally exposed all stars. weather was crystal clear. as i got to the bottom of pima i was too low to see it so i headed back up the hill (pima). i went on to the rooftop terrace at my house when i got home but could not see any of it anymore. 
 i did not hv my camera phone with me.
content.summary: Huge ship with 3 lights in chevron, then tilted and had 4 lights and looked square. hovered in the same place. it possibly got lower. over 15:00 this happened twice: one of the lights would break away and drift off westerly

content.detailedDescription:
Please call 714-996-8616 for a complete concise report. after 4-18 call 714-257-9703. my best guess is earthquake plasma or unmanned military drones. a major new fault, the chino fault is 500-750 yards from back yard. note the large orange white orb far right. this seemed like the mothership as the other orbs moved up in line, then took off. the top left orb is taking off note the gasses coming from the disk. they had black round rings on their underside. speak soon, 


 mark fane
for debra ewing.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Debra saw bright orbs, some were close to a neighbor, other three in line, as they shot off at impossible, look at the upper-left , they took off from there.

content.detailedDescription: At about 8:17 on wednesday night in palm springs, i look up and see what appears to be a star, moving west to east, slowing down and then speeding up, until a quick 90 degree turn north. after going north for about 10 seconds, it stopped for almost 45 seconds before leaving my visible horizon in the same direction (north). it was not particularly bright, and there were no flashes on it. it looked like a star and i know was extremely high up, because a plane passed by underneath while it was stationary for those 45 seconds. it appeared much higher than the plane.
content.summary: Star-like object moving in desert sky

content.detailedDescription:
Home about 6 pm.
bright orange object in sky captured my eye.
obvious it was not an airplane.
flew very fast south to north pulsating bright orange.
extremely awesome experience, heard there were other objects in area and seen others over few days, wild. now really strange things have been happening.
content.summary: Bright orange, no sound, very fast, like a pulsating ball of energy

content.detailedDescription: Walking the dog looked yo at the sky and saw a huge flaming white and yellow object streaking across the sky very close to earth. as big as an airplane and breaking into pieces as it moved 10 faster then an airplane.
content.summary: Huge flaming object as big as an airplane in size breaking up and moving fast

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside to look at moon, noticed a abnormally bright slightly larger than pinhead sized white light moving rapidly in a straight due east direction. came over the tree line at about 20 degrees, and was lost in cloud cover at around 120 degrees.Flew directly overhead. total time of viewing was 5-6 seconds. what struck me as odd is the speed; i'm in a flight path for fort meyers and commercial aircraft were in the area. this was moving at least 4x as fast. also most commercial aircraft are on a northeast, southwest trajectory, odd something going due east. this light was 3 or 4 times brighter than the lights on other aircraft nearby with no red strobe. just white light. wonder if anyone knows how to calculate speed based on 100 degree movement, figure at least 5 miles up, 5 second span. definitely cool, never know what you'll see looking up!
content.summary: Pinhead sized bright light moving east extremely fast

content.detailedDescription: I took 3 pictures in less than 1 min and check the last picture on top of my nephew's head
content.summary: I was just takeing pictures of my family and it came out on the back in the sky...I took 3 pictures but one of them has that object in the sky zoom in the back of pic on top of my nephews head plz thank you plz call back

content.detailedDescription: on march 29, 2017, i was walking along the bluffs on varsity area in calgary. at 3:49 pm local time, looking south, i decided to take photos of the sun and cloud formations as they were particularly beautiful. i noticed the orbs immediately after checking to make sure my photos were clear. the orbs were so perfect and so clear i knew it was not just a reflection of the sun. there was only one orb which made it even more apparent that it was unusual. i took 3 photos in rapid succession, 1 second apart. between each photo, the orb moved in apparent dramatic distances, but stayed within range of the camera lens. moments before i had  taken the photos, i had said out loud, " hello friendly ets." coincidence? i'm ecstatic about my experience. i did not see any more orbs after taking the photos.
content.summary: Took photos of the sun hoping to capture activity. saw the orbs after photos were taken.

content.detailedDescription:
It was midnight and a clear night, i was about to go to sleep and i couldn't help but noticed outside of my bedroom window, which is on the second floor- a very bright hovering orb in the south eastern sky direction. my eyes fixed on the unidentified object, i noticed it was pulsating with an aura of red, blue and green lights.Small traces of light would project from it. it hovered and wavered from side to side, up and down. i watched it transfixed for 15 minutes until i noticed another very bright white star like object that was much closer on the horizon above my neighbors roof tops-hovering in the same manner, going from south to north in a wavering up and down motion for about 3-4 minutes and then it disappeared as an airplane was flying past.  
i proceeded to watch the original colorful orb and noticed that it was now emitting very small white lights that then disappeared in the sky. the colorful orb was still hovering in the same manner for over 30 minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Colorful pulsating orb moving  se-ne direction, second bright star like object scanning over rooftops and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
On march 18th i was driving on interstate 94 south headed toward the cities. i entered i-94 from the hwy 23 entrance on the far west side of st. cloud. i passed an accident in the median of the road shortly after entering i-94.
i should add, the purpose of this trip was to attend a sunday event with a friend. i decided to drive down early so as not have to drive so much on sunday. and i needed to return sunday pm so i could fill my volunteer position on monday. 
after passing the accident and driving a while i noticed a bright flash of light to the south/south west of i-94. it appeared high up as bright orange/yellow flash, then dropped to tree top level and the light shrunk in size to that of a very bright star. i mentally noted the time on my vehicle as being 9:48pm. 
the light seemed to fade out and i figured it was nothing. a few miles later it reappeared at tree top level and continued. it appeared to be several miles away, 10 at least. though i am not good at judging night distance in the sky.
i then noticed that i missed my exit: 139 and kept driving and watching the light. i began to watch for a place to pull off and view the light and finally gave up and called my friend to see if he could use his phone to verify if there as a star or a flight in that direction. he was also driving on i-94 headed north to go home and was unable to check for me at the time.
i described to him what i saw and he dismissed it as a plane. 
i told him what time i saw the bright light and he commented to me that it was now 10:45pm. nearly 11:00pm. and that i had been watching the light for over an hour if i saw it at 9:48pm.
i found an exit and pulled off in an office building parking lot and watched the object move from left to right at tree top level. 
i quickly tried to relay to my friend where i was at and then hung up and kept driving, trying to keep a visual on the light. 
i finally stopped south of ???? and turned around. i pulled in a taco bell parking lot near the freeway and waited for my friend to arrive. 
he arrived within minutes of me stopping at the taco bell parking lot and i repeated all the information to him. he didn't seem to believe me, still calling it a plane. but the time seemed to not add up.
he did check a few star positions out with his phone and i pointed out a star with the same brightness as what i had seen.
later that night my friend asked me to leave in the morning, the relationship was over.
i am still not sure what happened that night as i was driving, but something did. the time still doesn't add up in my mind. it should have been closer to midnight, or perhaps i was tired and misjudged the time.   i don't have any further memory at this time of the incident.
content.summary: Driving on i-94 south and saw a flash of light

content.detailedDescription: Was putting groceries in the car at grocery store. then i looked up and saw this and right away pulled my phone out and started recording. another bystander saw it, but wasn't as amazed as i was. i don't know what made me look up, but then i'm always looking up at the sky. it was a very bright red fireball-like light floating to the southwest of laveen. i recorded it, but i don't know how to upload a video.
content.summary: Bright red fireball-like orb floating through the sky

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 5:22am on the morning of 23, march 2017 while riding my bike to work, i saw a light traveling from the west to east going about 300mph at an altitude of 30,000+ feet and about 15 miles distance and around 5 degrees from the horizon. the light being a little brighter than the background stars, traveled in a straight line making no noise or leaving no contrail, as normally seen when commercial airliners fly over. the object was visible for about 3 minutes before i lost sight of it as it went over the sandia mountains. the object caught my attention as i was looking in that general direction when i noticed it moving against the background stars. i thought to myself this is almost like the other objects i have seen over the last 3 years and wonder if i am the only person seeing these lights or objects. as far as i know i am the only witness at this time and no other people were with me a the time of this sighting and i did not tell anyone about this besides my girlfriend later that night.
content.summary: Object observed flying west to east over sandia mountains

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my deck talking on the phone. i was looking up at the stars telling my mom of a prior sighting and that's when i saw an orb. it was flying east to west and was grey in color with a little white. it almost looked like a cloud but it was moving to fast. i kept an on it it for a few, thenlost it. it was a very clear night do to the winds we had and it was not a weather ballon or plane. unfortunately i don't have any witnesses, but in a prior sighting i did have one. i know what i saw was real.
content.summary: Saw an gre y like orb, flying east to west.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my deck talking on the phone. i was looking up at the stars telling my mom of a prior sighting and that's when i saw an orb. it was flying east to west and was grey in color with a little white. it almost looked like a cloud but it was moving to fast. i kept an on it it for a few, thenlost it. it was a very clear night do to the winds we had and it was not a weather ballon or plane. unfortunately i don't have any witnesses, but in a prior sighting i did have one. i know what i saw was real.
content.summary: Saw an gre y like orb, flying east to west.

content.detailedDescription:
This all started a little over a month ago. it was exactly february 27, 2017 at approx. 0435 when my roommate pointed out the ship to me. it was the only time i've been able to see it perfectly. from our stoop i looked above the tree line and hovering south and to the west was anything unlike i had ever seen in my life. it was a perfect equilateral triangle; the base of it was black and at each point of the triangle was a large orb (which appeared pretty bright). i wasnt sure where they were coming from but i also noticed it emitted red/orange and blue lights. it made absolutely no noise and this first encounter lasted maybe 30-45 seconds tops. as i re-positioned myself to keep watching the ship, it had disappeared.

ever since that night i have witnessed the same ship (or maybe there are others) several times. 

as of late, every time i notice it it is positioned in the sky overhead to look like a star to the uninformed. at first i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me but sure enough this thing comes back every night and hovers very high up in the sky looking like a bright star and just pulsating red and blue lights. i dont know any star that can do that. it will sit up there observing for hours at a time sometimes way shorter than that. i have tried to get a video recording of it just sitting there, but its so far away that on camera it is just a twinkling orb.

most recently i was on my way to the movie theatre it was just around 2100 when i routinely spotted the orb in the night sky as it usually was when i looked up. but this time as i was watching it another orb appeared out of thin air but this one was not as bright. it hovered a few hundred feet away from the other and they sort of revolved together if that makes sense. what i mean is like the orb that appeared was changing direction in a clockwise formation to where it blocked the other orb from view and appeared on the opposite side of it. then the orb appeared to be getting closer and the single orb became the three lights i had known all too well and it flew about 500 feet away from me from over the highway to the south to the east/southeast. 

three nights later as i was waiting for an uber it was back again sure enough. 20 minutes later as i was pulling up to my girlfriends apartment i looked out the window and noticed the orb was much closer and much brighter but was not pulsating just a solid white/yellow color and then it reshaped itself somehow into the triangle ship and i was able to get the best footage of it to date.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw a black triangle and now i see it almost every night.

content.detailedDescription: Was just driving in the parking lot at home of the apartments i live at. my boyfriend and i were just smoking a cigarette in my car. our heads both started to hurt in the exact same spot so we just got out of the car and we both look up at the sky, i first seen a line moving but i'm thinking it's just my eyes but when i look harder, i see it wasn't a line but it was a triangle with light around it except for the back. i didn't hear anything i seen a plane in the sky that was higher than what we saw. then it disappeared over the building. we were both shocked at what we both seen, we both asked each other if we seen that? we're very curious to find out what exactly this was
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo flying by no sound at all. faint light all on the sides. it was descent sized

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home around 11:20 pm on wed march 28, 2017, i noticed 3 large orbs in the shape of a triangle in the sky. the area i live is very tree heavy and the object kept disappearing amongst the trees. i drove in the direction closer towards them, which was near the downtown minneapolis area. i followed them for about 15mins until i couldn't get a good view anymore. this was not the first time i've seen this shape before. they were huge, white/ light yellowish lights formed into a large,wide set triangle. it was very slow moving and in perfect uniform.
content.summary: 3 lights in a large triangle shape

content.detailedDescription:
The first time i saw this object i was sleeping and was wakened by something that took me to my bedroom window. i noticed it was very bright out.  brighter than a full moon.  i looked up to see something coming toward me with 3 lights on the front. one larger middle light and two smaller on each side. i could not move i had to watch this thing carry on moving over my house from the south to the north
  it move far slower than any air craft i had ever seen and flew just above the trees. my windows were open so i noticed it was making no sound. once it was over my house i went to my bathroom which faces the north. just in time to see it continue in a northerly heading. i watched until i could not see it any longer and went back to bed. 2 or 3 years later at the same time i woke to see exactly the same thing everything happened as it had a few years before. nothing was different.  i have not told anyone anyone about this til this day when i wrote to you.
content.summary: Object flew silently over my house on 2 different occasion in same direction

content.detailedDescription:
It was 9 pm on tuesday march 28, like every night around that time i take my dog for a walk. 
i take him to on the train tracks down the road and i usually stare at stars and satellites. 
about 15 minutes in i noticed something that looked like a faint letter 8 horizontally with no sound or visible light just shadowy and as it moved from nw to e at a steady pace, it appeared to bend the light of the stars as it moved. 
the only thing to describe best to what it looked like is the wormhole from interstellar movie just two side by side
content.summary: Silent camouflage aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
My wife had stopped at the local kroger (grocery store) to get groceries. when she walked out of the store and started toward her car, a woman was looking up at the sky. the woman asked my wife "what are those".

my wife describes the objects as white orbs that "shook" slightly, were moving very slowly, but not as a unit. they were very high in the sky (see photos) but not sure of exact altitude.

this was about 5:15 pm and i had just gotten home. sounding excited, my wife called me to come to the kroger to check out what it was. by the time i'd driven there, the objects were gone. thankfully my wife took pictures with her phone.
content.summary: White orbs, possibly weather balloons

content.detailedDescription: Me n my family were coming home after a night of playing pool at a smalltown bar there were two groups of people jn seperate cars the first load people 15 minutes early the second followed so the second load of people were driving back home n then realized there was a bright gree  light in the clouds beside them following so they speeded up,note the clouds were low that night and as theh speeded up the object kept right beside them n a weird change of event happened the object flew directly in front of the car n beamed a light on the car,there were five people in the car n when the object beamed a light on them they all saw a different number of light from 1 to 5 each persk  saw a different number n from there thats the last thing they could remember n all seem normal they had no memory of what happened until atleast a half hour later they all all tried to remember were tne light went afterwords n couldnt remember
content.summary: Got chase by green glowing object on a cloudy night and then object flew infront of car n beam light of car n from there no memory of event but all people in the car saw different number of lights when it beamed a light on the car9

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Estaba realizando una filmacion cuando de repente senti un haz de luz en el ojo izquierdo al cual no le tome importancia, llegando a casa cuando subo el video me doy con la sorpresa que esta en el video el ovni.
content.summary: Estaba filmando un video cuando derepente senti un haz de luz

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my children to their grandparents at 5:30 am in the morning down grissom rd in port st. john like every morning as my children went to school from their grandparents. i looked over to the east into the sky for no reason, i seen two cigar shaped objects glowing fluorescent green hovering which appeared to be hovering over the kennedy space center they were very large i slowed down to show my children i was really excited and a little scared thinking these could be ufo's as i never seen anything like this i don't know how long they were there as i had to get my children to school soon. my son remembers this day and event my daughter was to young to remember. i kept this to myself for many yrs thinking some would think i was seeing things and laugh and say i was making this up. i remember this as if it were yesterday. i learned about mufon and asked my son if he remembered this event and decided i would tell my story.Thank you, susan olive
content.summary: Driving north to the east seentwo cigar shape hovering what looked like over ksc color fluorescent green with glow

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the planets and stars with my telescope and had a look away from my telescope to aim my laser pointer. the thing that made me first notice it was a bright green light popping up out of nowhere. at first i just thought it was a plane but then realized that it was going to fast to be a plane and knew that they dont have green lights on them. the object was a bright green color that looked to be in a spherical shape, the object was moving semi-fast through the sky and turning off at times then back on. the feelings i thought were shocked, amazed, and found it very interesting. i lost sight of the object because it went out of view.
content.summary: I was looking in the night sky with my telescope and then i looked up at the sky with my own eye and saw a bright green light pop out of nowhere and start moving.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home through a relatively unfamiliar area and stopped to record some pleasant scenery as the weather was quite nice for a change. as i was taking the video i noticed something strange on my screen but couldnt actually see it with the naked eye i dismissed it as something on my windshield, but then all of a sudden i started to feel as if i was having a panic attack and my heart was beating very fast and erratically so i stopped recording and continued my drive home.
upon review of the video i realized that there was some sort of craft zipping around those wind turbines i was admiring, it appeared quickly out of nowhere, and hovered in sort of a circular motion a considerable distance away, looked like two discs flying tightly in tandem, with a light radiating around them at times.
content.summary: Only appeared on recording, did not see with naked eye, but observed while recording on screen.

content.detailedDescription: Circular object changing shapes and changing colors. went from   red to white when object went from counter-clock wise to counter-clockwise direction. object moved radically, up and down.
content.summary: Circular object changing shapes

content.detailedDescription: i had just made coffee and walked to the front window while waiting for my cup to cool down. looking out the first thing to get my attention was a flash of light at the intersection a block away. i remember thinking that it must have been a police car shining it spot light at me as it went though that intersection. blowing on my coffee and taking a sip i noticed a light moving toward me from the west. when the light became too bright for a car my heart beat began to race but before i could even think a white glowing cylinder with dome on top rounded the corner. it was hovering 3 or 4 feet above the road and the top was leaning in the direction it was moving. this amazing thing stopped at the intersection in front of my house, still hovering, and a beam of light shown down block at the houses on the west side of the street. then the beam went out the dome moved and a beam shown toward the houses on east side of the street. next the beam goes out and the dome moves then the cylinder leans west and moves down the block to the intersection where it turns a complete 360 degrees and then leans north and moves out of sight.
content.summary: A glowing cylinder with dome on top that spun around and projected a light beam.

content.detailedDescription:
was in our hot tub looking south. 1st saw an object moving from south to north and thought it was a lone bird...But wondered why a bird would be that high and moving faster than i originally thought....Disappeared after a minute or so and i thought "oh well" that was weird.
5 minutes later i looked to the south and saw 2 lights/stars that i thought were planes coming into fargo hector on approach but they were very high and very far away to the south....They then appeared to be motionless and then the one on the right moved "under" the other one and then they came closer. at this point, i went and asked my wife to come out and look and she did see them...Saying that was weird and maybe they were drones..I'm thinking weather balloons myself....Then the one that was below moved counterclockwise to about even with the one on the left.

i went in to get my phone to take a pic (not sure it would have shown up) or at least find some binoculars...When i came back outside...Nothing.

very weird to say the least.
content.summary: 2 sightings: 1st one went from s to n. 5 mins later 2 stars/lights that moved in the s. one rotated around the other

content.detailedDescription: We was in the north yorkshire moors just chilling and then we saw lights in the sky and heard like a humming buzzing sound, we thought it might of been a plane but the object sort of stayed in the same place for few moments over the hills and the quickly moved we don't think it was a helicopter or plane as it didn't sound like one and it was a diamond triangle sort of shape i don't know, maybe it was a ufo all i know there is something out there and there not telling us there keeping it a secret, you all need to know  the truth !
content.summary: Quick and breif moving object in the sky
